mapper.select: SELECT P.PLAN_ID, P.PLAN_NAME, P.CREATED_USER, C1.CODE_NM AS ONOFF_TYPE, P.HASHTAG, C2.CODE_NM AS STATUS, P.CREATE_PLAN_DATE FROM PLAN_INFO P JOIN TBL_CODE C1 ON P.ONOFF_TYPE = C1.CODE JOIN TBL_CODE C2 ON P.STATUS = C2.CODE WHERE (IS_DELETED = 0 OR IS_DELETED IS NULL) AND IS_PUBLIC = 1 AND C1.CODE_NM = #{onoffType} AND P.STATUS = 'PLAN002' AND (PLAN_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR HASHTAG LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')) ORDER BY CREATE_PLAN_DATE DESC ORDER BY P.PLAN_NAME ORDER BY P.VIEW DESC LIMIT 10 OFFSET #{page}

mapper.select: SELECT PLAN_ID, PLAN_NAME, CREATED_USER, ONOFF_TYPE, HASHTAG, CREATE_PLAN_DATE, UPDATE_PLAN_DATE, IS_PUBLIC, STATUS, DEFAULT_START_TIME, DEFAULT_END_TIME, START_DATE, END_DATE, MAX_MEMBER_NUM, GENDER, BIRTH_YEAR, PLAN_PWD, REGION, REGION_PART, VIEWS, KEYWORD, INTRO FROM PLAN_INFO WHERE PLAN_ID = #{plan_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE PLAN_INFO SET PLAN_NAME = #{plan_name}, ONOFF_TYPE = #{onoff_type}, HASHTAG = #{hashtag}, IS_PUBLIC = #{is_public}, PLAN_PWD = #{plan_pwd}, STATUS = #{status}, IS_DEFAULT = #{is_default}, DEFAULT_START_TIME = STR_TO_DATE(#{default_start_time}, '%H%i%s'), DEFAULT_END_TIME = STR_TO_DATE(#{default_end_time}, '%H%i%s'), INTRO = #{intro}, MAX_MEMBER_NUM = #{max_member_num}, IS_CONSTRAINTS = #{is_constraints}, GENDER = #{gender}, BIRTH_YEAR = #{birth_year}, UPDATE_PLAN_DATE = now() WHERE PLAN_ID = #{plan_id}
